name: Oil Press
unlockCondition: 3,000,000 ducats total wealth, access to olive supply
shortDescription: Facility for extracting oil from olives through pressing.
fullDescription: This specialized workshop houses large wooden or stone presses used to extract valuable oil from olives. The process involves crushing olives into a paste, then pressing them to separate the oil from the solids and water. The resulting olive oil is a staple of Venetian cuisine and an important trade commodity.
